Getting started on Windows using VisualStudio

This guide assumes that your chai3d installation is located in your home folder (e.g. %HOME%/chai3d)

Prerequisites

  • Make sure that VisualStudio is installed.

Compilation

  • open the main CHAI3D VisualStudio project file called CHAI3D-VS####.sln located in the installation root folder
  • make sure to open the file for the correct VisualStudio version (e.g. CHAI3D-VS2013.sln if using VisualStudio 2013)
  • select the build configuration and target architecture:
  • build CHAI3D and all examples (Ctrl+Shift+B)

Trying the examples

  • navigate Explorer to %HOME%/chai3d/bin
  • double-click on example executable (e.g. 01-mydevice.exe)

Reading the documentation

  • check out the documentation page
